name: Rotting in the Bleach Department
description:
Welcome to the Bleach Department!

The job is simple: Fill up the bleach bottles that the company provides. Hit your quota for each hour and you wont be fired!

Experience a story of poor work management in a chemical factory.

LINKS

You can find my twitter here!

Also, fellow game developer Hawksandwich has a discord I use frequently right here!

EXTRA

I downloaded two fonts for this game (the rest are from windows):

Digital Dream by Pizzadude (Jakob Fischer): https://www.1001fonts.com/digital-dream-font.html

Pixel FJVerdana by flashjunior: https://www.1001fonts.com/pix-pixelfjverdana12pt-font.html
